front.title: Export of Segment Routing over IPv6 Information in IP Flow Information Export (IPFIX)

abstract.t: This document introduces new IP Flow Information Export (IPFIX) Information Elements to identify a set of Segment Routing over IPv6 (SRv6) related information such as data contained in a Segment Routing Header (SRH), the SRv6 control plane, and the SRv6 behavior that traffic is being forwarded with.
